topic.title: Creating tabs from team favorites
topic.hint: Personal favorites cannot be created as tabs.

section.title: How to create a tab based on a team favorite
section.hint: Maxmized view cannot be created as tabs.

steps.item: Sign in to Mingle and open the project with the team favorites you want to convert to tabs (if you're not already working in the project). You don't need to sign in as a project administrator.
Create the team favorites you want to turn into tabs (if you haven't done so already).

Click the Project admin tab.
Mingle displays the Project settings page. (Note: if you are logged in as a project team member, Mingle displays the Team page.)
Click the Team Favorites & tabs link. Mingle displays the Team Favorites & tabs page.

item.p: Click the Make tab link next to the team favorites for which you want to create tabs.

Mingle creates a new tab with the name of the team favorite, and moves the team favorite into the Tabs section of the page. You can remove a tab at any time by clicking on the Make team favorite link, which will keep the team favorite but remove the tab.
